MONTPELIER- State Auditor Tom Thomas P. Salmon , a Republican who switched from the Democratic Party in 2009, confirmed Tuesday that he is considering running for the U.S. Senate next year against independent incumbent Sen. Bernie Sanders . We're in the very early stages, said Thomas P. Salmon of St. Johnsbury, who has alluded to challenging Sen. Bernie Sanders in Facebook messages and elsewhere. He said he would announce his decision by March 5, the birthday of the U.S. Navy Seabees, with
